resources.string: aMetro v.0.1.0.0. This is a program of cities underground and Metro. Displays the metro schemes, allows you to find the shortest path between stations, and also describes what is next to the stations. Maps are compatible with the project from pMetro. ©2010
Thanks to Boris Muradov (pMetro’s author, www.pmetro.su) for providing info and materials.
Your questions and suggestions send to ametroproject@gmail.com
